title: Shane Warne and former wife Simone Callahan reunite to celebrate daughter Summer's 18th birthday
text:
Cricket legend Shane Warne, 50, and his ex-wife Simone Callahan, 49, have put their differences aside to celebrate the 18th birthday of their youngest daughter Summer.

The former couple, who were married from 1995 to 2005, celebrated the joyous occasion with a family dinner in Melbourne on Saturday night.

Joining Shane and Simone were their three children, 22-year-old daughter Brooke, 20-year-old son Jackson and birthday girl Summer.

The friendly exes! Shane Warne, 50, and his former wife Simone Callahan, 49, reunited to celebrate their youngest daughter Summer's 18th birthday with a family dinner in Melbourne on Saturday night

Also spotted among the fray was Brooke's boyfriend Alex.

Clad in black jumper and dark jeans, Shane was seen enjoying a leisurely catch-up with his former flame as they mingled outside a busy restaurant.

The couple were later seen sitting next to each other as the enjoyed the celebratory meal with their brood.

Simone was dressed to impress, showing off her slender figure in skinny black jeans and a fluffy back jumper.

The yoga instructor allowed her blonde locks to fall in loose waves, and completed her look with a small black evening bag and matching block-heel pumps.

Simone was married to Shane for a decade before they called it quits in 2005.

The couple had a brief reunion four years later, before splitting again after Shane moved on with actress Liz Hurley.

Their relationship was tumultuous, mostly as a result of Shane's womanising throughout his sporting career.

Simone previously told New Idea she has struggled with trust issues since ending her 10-year marriage to notorious ladies' man Shane.

'I'm obviously not very good with relationships. I've only had two partners in 20 years ... maybe I've gone too much with my head and not enough with my heart,' she said.

'It's hard to have a normal relationship when I have been so hurt.'

Despite this, the pair have remained dedicated to raising their three children together.
